column2: Latest;Siem Reap:------ At 6:30 pm on August 2
column4: a fire broke out at the pagoda in Boeung Daun village
column6: Siem Reap city.------Two stalls were burned
column7: but there was no other damage or injury to people.------The cause of the fire was reported as coming from candles which had been left to burn without supervision.------Authorities intervened three fire trucks to control the blaze.------ Source
